concept.title: The project overview window
concept.shortdesc: All information about a project is contained in the Project overview window.

conbody.p:
Clicking the FormulaNet icon opens the Project overview window. The Project overview window
The Project overview window
There are 5 options available in the upper margin of the Projects Overview window:

ul.li: New formula: This option is to create a new query by manually inputting the product formula by ingredient (see 4.1).
Upload formula: This option is to create a new query by directly uploading properly-formatted files to be queried (see 4.2).
Resubmit formula: Modify a project that has already been run.
Search: Searches the Projects overview window.
